recentSixBlogs.title: What's new in Angular? -  Standalone components
recentSixBlogs.description: Last week Angular team released v15 of the framework which is a major release with a lot of new features. Among that, standalone components are out of developer preview and is stable now. It is also accompanied by a set of new standalone APIs to enhance the development.
